items.name: view
items.description: A wrapper Component for templates using the power of excellent Riot.js Virtual DOM library.

items.name: modal
items.description: A component to open and close `modal` window.

items.name: submitter
items.description: A post event emitter for Forms, sending all data as json or a serialized string.

items.name: validation
items.description: This component uses validator AMD module and generates dynamically validation rules by using html markup definitions
